headline: Is Allstate (ALL) Pricing Reflect Its Strong Excess Returns After Recent Share Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Allstate at around US$193.65 is offering fair value or something more interesting, this breakdown will help you connect the share price to what you are actually paying for the business. The stock has returned 0.7% over the last 7 days, while sitting on a 6.1% return over 1 year, 62.5% over 3 years and 104.3% over 5 years, with a 6.8% decline over 30 days and a 5.0% decline year to date, hinting that expectations and risk perception may be shifting.
